title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change right away.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be "18 points".

OB: 

EB: The label's height should be justified with the font size.

SR: 1. Add a label and edit its font size to be "18 points".
